title: Update handling of containers in GitHub Workflows
github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.58.1
Demote repeated log messages to trace
Remove a bunch of safety notes
Do not attempt to print stderr or stdout if not PIPED
Update current development environment to Fedora 35
github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.58
Resolve clippy errors in stratisd for Rust 1.58.0
No longer ignore a high devicemapper version in rawhide
Include stratis dracut module by default if it is installed
Make error code for invalid redundancy u16
Do not give argument to --lib option
Update Github Actions Ubuntu container to Hirsute
Move ubuntu tests to a separate file
Strip out redundancy field in engines
Change liminal device code to respect udev remove events
github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.57
Get cached used value for filesystem in check()
Fix behavior on timed pool and filesystem check failure
Fix missing signal for allocated size changes
body:
Closes #2863 

Hi @tasleson feel free to verify this one as well! I've tested on my end.

title: Fix property calculation for TotalPhysicalUsed
body:
Closes #2860

@tasleson If you'd like, please confirm that this resolves this issue. I tested it on my end, but I'm happy to have you double check!

title: Exclude hidden files from the packaged crate
Ignore high version of devicemapper in rawhide
Advance next development environment to Fedora 35
No longer ignore libblkid-rs and stratisd-proc-macros
Exclude README for tests from rust release
Extend metadata spare segments when extending metadata device
Drop transitive dependency on time crate
github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.56.1
Remove config file requiring stratis dracut module to avoid initramfs generation failure
Fix logging when using blkid to verify devices
github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.56
nightly: Add clap to f34 ignore-low
Migrate FetchProperties values to standard D-Bus properties
Do not release Cargo.lock for stratisd_proc_macros
Add a dummy test in order to identify stale PRs
Change name from Bind/Unbind to BindClevis/UnbindClevis
Remove dead parameter, interactive, for stratisd v3.0
Clean up after failed rollback tests to avoid lingering devicemapper device
